comment.author: 67145548@N04
comment._content: This is not Dalecarlia Reservoir; it is Georgetown Reservoir located between Canal Road and the C&O Canal and MacArthur Boulevard Northwest. The irregularly-shaped Dalecarlia Reservoir is further upriver, straddling the DC-Maryland line. maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&q=dalecarlia+reservoir&...
